# semantic

**Instance Property**

The semantic of the vertex attribute, which describes how you want RealityKit to interpret the attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
var semantic: LowLevelMesh.VertexSemantic
```

## Discussion

RealityKit consults the vertex semantic when interpreting the data in your [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelMesh]. For example, an attribute with the semantic value of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelMesh/VertexSemantic/position] uses to determine the position of a vertex.

## Describing an attribute

- **format**: The format of the vertex attribute.
- **offset**: The location of an attribute in vertex data, determined by the byte offset from the start of the vertex data.
- **layoutIndex**: The index of the layout that contains this attribute.
